name: Scheduled Sea Lanes
description: Designated maritime routes provide safe and predictable transportation across water. The established routes reduce navigation risks, while the predictable nature makes them vulnerable to piracy and military interdiction.
atmosphere: Ship engines hum across open water while lapping waves create a rhythm of maritime transportation. The air carries the salty scent of sea, ship tar, and the promise of safe passage. Every surface feels the motion of established routes. Your skin feels the ship deck and the sense of predictable danger. The taste of safe transportation and maritime freedom fills your mouth.
